price: (Ibliis) kaa sε: “Me Wura Nyankopͻn, sεdeε Wama me ayera yi deε, nokorε sε, mεma (bͻne) ayε wͻn fε wͻ asaase so, na mayera wͻn nyinaa,-
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَغۡوَيۡتَنِي لَأُزَيِّنَنَّ لَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَأُغۡوِيَنَّهُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi bimā aghwaytanī la-uzayyinanna lahum fī al-arḍi wala-ugh'wiyannahum ajmaʿīna
